00031 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LQUOTA
00032 
00033 #include <linux/version.h>
00034 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00035 #include <obd.h>
00036 #include <linux/seq_file.h>
00037 #include "lquota_internal.h"
00038 
00039 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00040 /* structure allocated at seq_open time and release when seq_release is called.
00041  * It is passed to seq_start/stop/next/show which can thus use the same lu_env
00042  * to be used with the iterator API */
00043 struct lquota_procfs {
00044         struct dt_object        *lqp_obj;
00045         struct lu_env            lqp_env;
00046 };
00047 
00048 /* global shared environment */
00049 static void *lprocfs_quota_seq_start(struct seq_file *p, loff_t *pos)
00050 {
00051         struct lquota_procfs    *lqp = p->private;
00052         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00053         struct dt_it            *it;
00054         loff_t                   offset = *pos;
00055         int                      rc;
00056 
00057         LASSERT(lqp);
00058 
00059         if (offset == 0)
00060                 return SEQ_START_TOKEN;
00061         offset--;
00062 
00063         if (lqp->lqp_obj == NULL)
00064                 /* accounting not enabled. */
00065                 return NULL;
00066 
00067         /* initialize iterator */
00068         iops = &lqp->lqp_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00069         it = iops->init(&lqp->lqp_env, lqp->lqp_obj, 0);
00070         if (IS_ERR(it)) {
00071                 CERROR("%s: failed to initialize iterator: rc = %ld\n",
00072                        lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name,
00073                        PTR_ERR(it));
00074                 return NULL;
00075         }
00076 
00077         /* move on to the first valid record */
00078         rc = iops->load(&lqp->lqp_env, it, 0);
00079         if (rc < 0) { /* Error */
00080                 goto not_found;
00081         } else if (rc == 0) {
00082                 /*
00083                  * Iterator didn't find record with exactly the key requested.
00084                  *
00085                  * It is currently either
00086                  *
00087                  *     - positioned above record with key less than
00088                  *       requested - skip it.
00089                  *     - or not positioned at all (is in IAM_IT_SKEWED
00090                  *       state) - position it on the next item.
00091                  */
00092                 rc = iops->next(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00093                 if (rc != 0)
00094                         goto not_found;
00095         }
00096         while (offset--) {
00097                 rc = iops->next(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00098                 if (rc != 0) /* Error or reach the end */
00099                         goto not_found;
00100         }
00101         return it;
00102 
00103 not_found:
00104         iops->put(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00105         iops->fini(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00106         return NULL;
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void lprocfs_quota_seq_stop(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00110 {
00111         struct lquota_procfs    *lqp = p->private;
00112         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00113         struct dt_it            *it;
00114 
00115         if (lqp->lqp_obj == NULL || v == NULL || v == SEQ_START_TOKEN)
00116                 return;
00117 
00118         iops = &lqp->lqp_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00119         it = (struct dt_it *)v;
00120         /* if something wrong happened during ->seq_show, we need to release
00121          * the iterator here */
00122         iops->put(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00123         iops->fini(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void *lprocfs_quota_seq_next(struct seq_file *p, void *v, loff_t *pos)
00127 {
00128         struct lquota_procfs    *lqp = p->private;
00129         const struct dt_it_ops  *iops;
00130         struct dt_it            *it;
00131         int                      rc;
00132 
00133         LASSERT(lqp);
00134 
00135         ++*pos;
00136         if (lqp->lqp_obj == NULL)
00137                 return NULL;
00138 
00139         if (v == SEQ_START_TOKEN)
00140                 return lprocfs_quota_seq_start(p, pos);
00141 
00142         iops = &lqp->lqp_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00143         it = (struct dt_it *)v;
00144 
00145         rc = iops->next(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00146         if (rc == 0)
00147                 return it;
00148 
00149         if (rc < 0)
00150                 CERROR("%s: seq_next failed: rc = %d\n",
00151                        lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00152 
00153         /* Reach the end or error */
00154         iops->put(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00155         iops->fini(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00156         return NULL;
00157 }
00158 
00159 /*
00160  * Output example:
00161  *
00162  * usr_accounting:
00163  * - id:      0
00164  *   usage:   { inodes:                  209, kbytes:             2616 }
00165  * - id:      840000038
00166  *   usage:   { inodes:                    1, kbytes:             1048 }
00167  */
00168 static int lprocfs_quota_seq_show(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00169 {
00170         struct lquota_procfs            *lqp = p->private;
00171         struct lquota_thread_info       *qti = lquota_info(&lqp->lqp_env);
00172         const struct dt_it_ops          *iops;
00173         struct dt_it                    *it;
00174         struct dt_key                   *key;
00175         struct dt_rec                   *rec = (struct dt_rec *)&qti->qti_rec;
00176         const struct lu_fid             *fid;
00177         int                              rc;
00178 
00179         LASSERT(lqp);
00180         if (lqp->lqp_obj == NULL) {
00181                 seq_printf(p, "not supported\n");
00182                 return 0;
00183         }
00184 
00185         fid = lu_object_fid(&lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu);
00186 
00187         if (v == SEQ_START_TOKEN) {
00188                 if (fid_is_acct(fid)) {
00189                         if (fid_oid(fid) == ACCT_USER_OID)
00190                                 seq_printf(p, "usr_accounting:\n");
00191                         else
00192                                 seq_printf(p, "grp_accounting:\n");
00193                 } else if (fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_QUOTA_GLB) {
00194                         int     poolid, rtype, qtype;
00195 
00196                         rc = lquota_extract_fid(fid, &poolid, &rtype, &qtype);
00197                         if (rc)
00198                                 return rc;
00199 
00200                         seq_printf(p, "global_pool%d_%s_%s\n", poolid,
00201                                    RES_NAME(rtype), QTYPE_NAME(qtype));
00202                 } else if (fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_NAME) {
00203                         /* global index copy object */
00204                         seq_printf(p, "global_index_copy:\n");
00205                 } else {
00206                         return -ENOTSUPP;
00207                 }
00208                 return 0;
00209         }
00210 
00211         iops = &lqp->lqp_obj->do_index_ops->dio_it;
00212         it = (struct dt_it *)v;
00213 
00214         key = iops->key(&lqp->lqp_env, it);
00215         if (IS_ERR(key)) {
00216                 CERROR("%s: failed to get key: rc = %ld\n",
00217                        lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name,
00218                        PTR_ERR(key));
00219                 return PTR_ERR(key);
00220         }
00221 
00222         rc = iops->rec(&lqp->lqp_env, it, rec, 0);
00223         if (rc) {
00224                 CERROR("%s: failed to get rec: rc = %d\n",
00225                        lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name, rc);
00226                 return rc;
00227         }
00228 
00229         seq_printf(p, "- %-8s %llu\n", "id:", *((__u64 *)key));
00230         if (fid_is_acct(fid))
00231                 seq_printf(p, "  %-8s { inodes: %20"LPF64"u, kbytes: %20"LPF64
00232                            "u }\n", "usage:",
00233                            ((struct lquota_acct_rec *)rec)->ispace,
00234                            toqb(((struct lquota_acct_rec *)rec)->bspace));
00235         else if (fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_QUOTA_GLB ||
00236                  fid_seq(fid) == FID_SEQ_LOCAL_NAME)
00237                 seq_printf(p, "  %-8s { hard: %20"LPF64"u, soft: %20"LPF64
00238                            "u, granted: %20"LPF64"u, time: %20"LPF64"u }\n",
00239                            "limits:",
00240                            ((struct lquota_glb_rec *)rec)->qbr_hardlimit,
00241                            ((struct lquota_glb_rec *)rec)->qbr_softlimit,
00242                            ((struct lquota_glb_rec *)rec)->qbr_granted,
00243                            ((struct lquota_glb_rec *)rec)->qbr_time);
00244         return 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247 struct seq_operations lprocfs_quota_seq_sops = {
00248         .start  = lprocfs_quota_seq_start,
00249         .stop   = lprocfs_quota_seq_stop,
00250         .next   = lprocfs_quota_seq_next,
00251         .show   = lprocfs_quota_seq_show,
00252 };
00253 
00254 static int lprocfs_quota_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00255 {
00256         struct seq_file         *seq;
00257         int                      rc;
00258         struct lquota_procfs    *lqp;
00259 
00260         /* Allocate quota procfs data. This structure will be passed to
00261          * seq_start/stop/next/show via seq->private */
00262         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lqp);
00263         if (lqp == NULL)
00264                 return -ENOMEM;
00265 
00266         /* store pointer to object we would like to iterate over */
00267         lqp->lqp_obj = (struct dt_object *)PDE_DATA(inode);
00268 
00269         /* Initialize the common environment to be used in the seq operations */
00270         rc = lu_env_init(&lqp->lqp_env, LCT_LOCAL);
00271         if (rc) {
00272                 char *obd_name = "quota";
00273 
00274                 if (lqp->lqp_obj != NULL)
00275                         obd_name = lqp->lqp_obj->do_lu.lo_dev->ld_obd->obd_name;
00276 
00277                 CERROR("%s: error initializing procfs quota env: rc = %d\n",
00278                        obd_name, rc);
00279                 goto out_lqp;
00280         }
00281 
00282         rc = LPROCFS_ENTRY_CHECK(inode);
00283         if (rc < 0)
00284                 goto out_env;
00285 
00286         rc = seq_open(file, &lprocfs_quota_seq_sops);
00287         if (rc)
00288                 goto out_env;
00289 
00290         seq = file->private_data;
00291         seq->private = lqp;
00292         return 0;
00293 
00294 out_env:
00295         lu_env_fini(&lqp->lqp_env);
00296 out_lqp:
00297         OBD_FREE_PTR(lqp);
00298         return rc;
00299 }
00300 
00301 static int lprocfs_quota_seq_release(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00302 {
00303         struct seq_file         *seq = file->private_data;
00304         struct lquota_procfs    *lqp = seq->private;
00305 
00306         LASSERT(lqp);
00307         lu_env_fini(&lqp->lqp_env);
00308         OBD_FREE_PTR(lqp);
00309 
00310         return seq_release(inode, file);
00311 }
00312 
00313 struct file_operations lprocfs_quota_seq_fops = {
00314         .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
00315         .open           = lprocfs_quota_seq_open,
00316         .read           = seq_read,
00317         .llseek         = seq_lseek,
00318         .release        = lprocfs_quota_seq_release,
00319 };
00320 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
